section.name: Depot Builder Command Line
section.source: Usage: build [-list <pattern> -consumers | -select <pattern> -consumers -verbose -plugin <artifact> -version <version> -D<property>=<value> <target1> [<target2> ...] | -help] options -list -consumers -list (-l) <pattern> List selected project(s). -consumers (-c) Consumer switch. -select -consumers -verbose -plugin -version -select (-s) <pattern> Build selected project(s). -consumers (-c) Consumer switch. -verbose (-v) Enable verbose mode. -plugin <artifact> Default builder plugin uri. -version <version> Build output artifact version. -D<property>=<value> Set property values. <target> [<target> ...] -help (-h) List command help.

subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The Depot build management tool (named build) provides support for listing of library content, listing information about specific projects, and the execution of single or multi-project builds. Build execution is delegated to a build plugin which may be customized at the level of the build management system, individual project or module.

tr.td: Modifies the selection to be consumers of the selected project.
Override context slection to build one or more projects.
Set one or more system properties.
Invoke a build with one or more target.
